and exists (select 1 from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = ba.`uid` and bu1.uname like concat('%',#{queryFqrName},'%'))
and ba.`activity_name` like concat('%',#{queryAcName},'%')
and ba.`uid` = #{queryUid}
ORDER BY ba.create_time DESC
